Nhung khi sau do hon 1thang thi toi, gia dinh, ban be cung nhu ng than cu nhan dc dt tu nv home credit goi lam phien. sau khi goi truc tiep cho toi thi toi da giai thich nhu vay nhung nv ben home credit cung xac nhan va xem xet va roi sau do k con goi cho toi nua ma lai goi cho nhung ng than cua toi. Sau khi giai thich cho ng than cua toi va yeu cau ho nv co goi nua thi bao goi truc tiep cho toi ma nv HOME k goi cho toi ma do loi la goi cho toi ma toi k nghe may....
